Q_DESC:
Create a class called Code with, one private integer data member called number. 

Include the following member functions : 
initializeData() that accepts one integer argument and its return type is void. This function is used to provide an initial value to number. Assume that number is always 3-digit integer.

getNumber() that accepts no argument and its return type is int. This function returns the value of number. 

convertTostraightBinary() that accepts no argument and its returns a pointer to an integer array. The size of the integer array is number 12 and it is used to hold the binary equivalent code of the number.
